title: Pavel Solomatin
text:
Pavel Olegovich Solomatin (; born 4 April 1993) is a Russian <a href="association%20football">football</a> player. He plays for <a href="FC%20Amkar%20Perm">FC Amkar Perm</a>.
Club career.
He made his debut in the <a href="Russian%20Second%20Division">Russian Second Division</a> for <a href="FC%20Karelia%20Petrozavodsk">FC Karelia Petrozavodsk</a> on 18 April 2011 in a game against <a href="FC%20Petrotrest%20St.%20Petersburg">FC Petrotrest St. Petersburg</a>.
He played his first match in <a href="Russian%20Premier%20League">Russian Premier League</a> for <a href="FC%20Dynamo%20Moscow">FC Dynamo Moscow</a> on 16 March 2013 as a substitute in away game against <a href="FC%20Kuban%20Krasnodar">FC Kuban Krasnodar</a> (1-1).
